DOC.brief_summary: Food intake has a great influence on blood glucose of patients with diabetes. This study was designed to determine the glycemic index (GI) of a particular pomelo named Majia pomelo and its effects on postprandial glucose (PPG) excursions in both healthy subjects and patients with type 2 diabetes (T2DM).
DOC.brief_title: Glycemic Responses to Majia Pomelos in Type 2 Diabetic Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study was to evaluate the GI and effects on glucose excursion of Majia pomelo in both healthy and diabetic subjects. The results may help diabetic subjects and their health care providers in developing a diet that is both medically and culturally appropriate.
